doc.field: Captain Freeman H. Smith Family Letters
Captain Freeman H. Smith Family Letters
Captain Freeman H. Smith was a whaler who died at sea in 1855. This collection consists of correspondence between his widow Agnes and son Arthur to Joseph Wickham Case, who administered his estate.
Captain Freeman H. Smith was a whaler who died at sea in 1855. This collection consists of correspondence between his widow Agnes and son Arthur to Joseph Wickham Case, who administered his estate.

Eleven letters from Agnes and Arthur Smith to Joseph Wickham Case, who administered the estate of Captain Freeman H. Smith, a whaler who died at sea in 1855. The letters date from 1863 to 1865 and are stored in one folder.
